title: Fix crash when getting community tokens details

labels.name: E:Desktop Community Bugfixes MVP
labels.description: Misc bug fixes about communities that are due for the MVP

milestone.title: 0.15.5 - Stabilizing release
milestone.description:
A point milestone where we focus 100% on bug fixing, stabilisation and finishing any unfinished items from 0.15  

Zero new messaging and community features.

--- Wallet ---

- Database re-encryption flows
- Community Asset and NFT designs for Asset screens
- Community token visibility
- Minor updates to Asset screens

body:
Crash was caught during application startup.
I had a few communities with different tokens.
Some exceptions were of different type than RpcException and were not caught.

i was able to reproduce this today, now i am not able to login with my seed at all
